scripts.test:optimized: pnpm run build:optimized && FOUNDRY_PROFILE=test-optimized forge test -vvv
scripts.test:coverage:report: forge coverage --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
scripts.deploy:SplitsWarehouse:test: export DRY_RUN=true && source .env && FOUNDRY_PROFILE=optimized forge script script/SplitsWarehouse.s.sol:SplitsWarehouseScript --account SPLITS_V2_DEPLOYER -vvvvv --rpc-url tempo-testnet
scripts.deploy:SplitsWarehouse: export DRY_RUN=false && source .env && FOUNDRY_PROFILE=optimized forge script script/SplitsWarehouse.s.sol:SplitsWarehouseScript --account SPLITS_V2_DEPLOYER --broadcast --verify -vvvvv --rpc-url tempo-testnet
